entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:59 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 8:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain before morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
